meanings.sent1: The effluxes of water from the dam were powerful.
meanings.sent2: The effluxes of students from the school at the end of the day were orderly.
meanings.sent3: The effluxes of giggles from the classroom made the teacher smile.
meanings.sent4: The effluxes of emotions from her heart were overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The effluxes of light from the setting sun painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: She observed the effluxes of traffic from the highway.
meanings.sent2: The effluxes of information from the meeting were enlightening.
meanings.sent3: The effluxes of laughter from the comedy show filled the room.
meanings.sent4: The effluxes of creativity from her mind were endless.
meanings.sent5: The effluxes of energy from the athlete were impressive.

meanings.sent1: The effluxes of lava from the volcano were dangerous.
meanings.sent2: The effluxes of people from the stadium after the game were chaotic.
meanings.sent3: The effluxes of bubbles from the soda can were amusing.
meanings.sent4: The effluxes of ideas from the brainstorming session were innovative.
meanings.sent5: The effluxes of colors from the artist's brush were mesmerizing.
